section_title: ARTICLE 6 OF THE CONVENTION (Education, training and public awareness)
sentences: The Secretariat introduced the agenda item (FCCC/SBI/2010/2, FCCC/SBI/2010/3, FCCC/SBI/2010/10, FCCC/SBI/2010/22, FCCC/SBI/2010/9, FCCC/SBI/2010/23, FCCC/SBI/2010/24 and FCCC/SBI/2010/MISC.7).
The Dominican Republic, for the G-77/CHINA, requested the establishment of a contact group.
The SBI agreed to establish a contact group chaired by Pa Ousman Jarju (the Gambia).
